meanings.definition: A woman who is married to one's father after the death or divorce of one's mother.
meanings.sent1: My stepmother is kind and helps me with my homework.
meanings.sent2: I visited my stepmother during the school holidays.
meanings.sent3: My stepmother always makes the best pancakes on Sundays.
meanings.sent4: The stepmother of the family, she brought love and warmth into their home.
meanings.sent5: The stepmother's gentle smile made the house feel like a cozy nest.

meanings.definition: The wife of one's parent when distinct from one's natural or legal mother.
meanings.sent1: My stepmother and I enjoy gardening together on weekends.
meanings.sent2: I called my stepmother to wish her a happy birthday.
meanings.sent3: The stepmother accidentally added salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent4: She was like a stepmother to all the children in the neighborhood, always ready to listen and help.
meanings.sent5: The stepmother's laughter filled the room with joy and laughter.
